scene02.title: Asia Bay 5G AIoT
scene02.subtitle: Water Screen Interactive Show
scene02.description:
Experience the dazzling water screen
 projection show at the Great Harbor Bridge.
 Join us for this spectacular event!
scene02.mode01_description: Select an icon to light up the sky!

scene03_mode1.title: Select Icon
scene03_mode1.subtitle: Fireworks
scene03_mode1.info_modal_content:
Light up the night at the Great Harbor Bridge! Choose your favorite firework, confirm, and swipe up. Your firework will appear on the water screen instantly.
Join us and enjoy the festive atmosphere!

scene03_mode2.title: Drawing
scene03_mode2.subtitle: Drawing
scene03_mode2.info_modal_content:
Let your creativity shine!
Choose the drawing area, pick a brush, and start creating. Your art will instantly appear on the water screen. Ready to impress?
Let's make an unforgettable night!

scene03_mode3.title: Messages
scene03_mode3.subtitle: Messages
scene03_mode3.info_modal_content: Have something you've been wanting to say? Choose a subject and a message from the lists to express your thoughts! Your message will appear on the water screen, creating memories at the Great Harbor Bridge.
scene03_mode3.send_title1: Your firework image has been sent!
